title: Calories in 6 oz Raspberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 6 oz raspberries, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks.
assumptions: Fresh, raw raspberries; 6 oz ≈ 170 g; whole berries, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ripeness, variety, freshness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged products.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz of fresh raspberries provide ~88 kcal and ~13 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Frozen raspberries (unsweetened) vs fresh per 100 g
With 1 tbsp whipped cream per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz of raspberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 88 kcal for 6 oz fresh raspberries.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in 6 oz raspberries?
faqs.a: About 11 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.
Yes, ~20 g carbs total, mostly from fiber and natural sugars.

faqs.q: Do raspberries have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (~1 g) and 0 mg cholesterol.

faqs.q: How does portion size affect calories in raspberries?
faqs.a: Per 100 g: 52 kcal; scale up for larger servings like 6 oz ≈170 g.
